title: League Forums
body:
Come join us!

We are a new forums where you can post builds, videos, general discussion and able to meet new friends!!!!

link is: www.leagueforums.net

Referral name: gargle cum

We hope to see you there guys!

replies.body:
Wtf, gargle cum?

You guys have fun with each other I'm staying here.

I'm with Chicken, cause he's / she's sexy in gravy :P <3
ily
Why can't we post videos and builds here, in the official boards, instead of a website where people can name themselves "gargle cum"

I was still on board until that line that started with "Referral name...", I mean, lol wat?

Meh, if you wanna post things and all that, you could just stick with the official forum you know.
